description: This source file contains integration tests for the Flutter application, verifying the app launch and main screen rendering. It includes helper functions for widget wait conditions and tests that ensure the app's main components load correctly and respond safely to basic user interactions.

classes.name: _pumpUntil
classes.description: Helper function to wait until a certain widget condition is true within a timeout period.

classes.name: _waitForFinder
classes.description: Helper function to wait until a specific widget is found using a Finder.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main test suite initializing the integration test binding, setting up app launch tests to verify main screen components and user interactions.
